casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
William Gerald Price No. 133P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 William Gerald Price, for Price, William Gerald. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Defendant on the 12th of April 2016 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30 (substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of April 2016 by Defendant in this matter discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to for G.S. 7A-31, following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of the Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
